vote.text: Amendment SA 909 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 909 proposed by Senator Thune for Senator Cruz. (consideration: CR S4737-4738; text: CR S4737-4738) To amend the preamble.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 909 proposed by Senator Thune for Senator Cruz.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 909 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
